mapper.select:
select
distinct
from order_master
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into order_master (order_id, buyer_name, buyer_phone, buyer_address, buyer_openid, order_amount, order_status, pay_status, create_time, update_time) values (#{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{buyerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{buyerPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{buyerAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{buyerOpenid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{orderStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{payStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
